Directed by Patrick Cady. Sharat Raju. Ernest R. Dickerson. Alex Zakrzewski. Hagar Ben-Asher. Adam Davidson. Zetna Fuentes. Kate Woods. Logan Kibens.

Written by Tom Bernardo. Tom Bernardo. Tom Bernardo. Michael Connelly. Michael Connelly. Michael Connelly. Michael Connelly. Eric Ellis Overmyer. Eric Ellis Overmyer. Eric Ellis Overmyer. Chris Wu. Chris Wu. Osokwe Tychicus Vasquez. Osokwe Tychicus Vasquez. Naomi Iizuka. Titus Welliver. Titus Welliver.

Cast  Titus Welliver( Harry Bosch 1) . Mimi Rogers( Honey Chandler 1) . Madison Lintz( Maddie Bosch 1) . Stephen A. Chang( Maurice ‘Mo’ Bassi 1) . Denise G. Sanchez( Reina Vasquez 1) . Liam James Ramos( Gilberto Veracruz ) . Tetiana Gaidar( Assassin ) . Zylan Brooks( Mrs. Davis ) . Sam Valentine( Jasmin/epe ) . Terri Hoyos( Olivia McDonald ) . Tom Costello( Lieutenant Cosgrove ) . Katia Gomez( Carmen Molina ) . Kathy Wu( Jessica Li ) . Ren Burttet( James ) . Eric Ladin( Scott Anderson ) . Deji LaRay( Edgewood ) . Will Chase( Kurt Dockweiler ) . Scott Klace( Sgt. John Mankiewicz ) . Cynthia Kaye McWilliams( Detective Bennett ) . Don Luce( Willy Datz ) . Olivia Sandoval( DDA Susan SaldaÃ±o ) . Yvette Cason( Judge Alberta Ryan ) . Troy Evans( Barrel ) . Gregory Scott Cummin/eps( Crate ) . Gabriel Tigerman( Dr. Shipman ) . Jeff Corbett( Judge Ronald Baker ) . Jim Holmes( D.A. Archer ) . Joe Adler( Jeffrey Herstadt ) . Mike Ostroski( Russ Pensak ) . Raff Anoushian( Leo Aslan ) . Jai Rodriguez( Officer Scott Templin ) . Ernest Waddell( Poly First Security Guard ) . Noah Gibson Slates( Kalon Davis ) . Carlos Arellano( Det. Poydras ) . Turhan Troy Caylak( Masked Hitman ) . George Tsai( U.S. Attorney Samuel Kim ) . Dimitry Rozental( Detective Nikita Bulgakov ) . John Savage( Halley Lewis ) . Cleveland Berto( SIS Officer ) . Marie Buck( Pregnant Woman ) . Patrick Faucette( Curtis Boseman ) . Shaun Montes( Truck Driver ) . Shawn Vaughn( Bartender Andre Masters ) . Josh Breslow( Matt ) . Ty Trumbo( James Allen ) . Mark Atteberry( Detective Pete Fusco ) . Troy Blendell( E. Edwards Wilson ) . Jonathan Bray( Oscar Green ) . Heng Theng( Peter Nguyen ) . Jamie Hector( Det. Jerry Edgar ) . Reed Diamond( Vincent Franzen ) . Michael Cudlitz( Edge ) . Pasha D. Lychnikoff( Baba ) . Aisha Kabia( Michelle Carter ) . Lindsay Musil( Bella Winslow ) . Barry Livingston( Gary Potter ) . Sean Riggs( Russell Barnes ) . Stephanie Erb( Attorney Amanda Scones ) . Mark Adair-Rios( DDA Alex Kennedy ) . Annie Abbott( Abigail Turnbull ) . Sasha Golberg( Security Guard ) . John Zderko( RHD Det. Matt Dorsey ) . Zaria( Jen Clewell ) . Gilbert Glenn Brown( DCA Paul Kessler ) . Keith Jefferson( Mr. Davis ) . Kevin Kent( Special Forces Operator ) . Essence Renae( Krys Davis ) . Moronai Kanekoa( Officer Kai Morgan ) . Todd James Jackson( FBI Agent Powell ) . Eric Patrick Harper( Officer Rick Kovak ) . Betsy Baker( Jo Adcock ) . Patrick Robert Smith( Terry O’Neill ) . Paul Guzman( Reporter #2 ) . Brett T. Friedmann( Garrett Wakefield ) . Tyler Wolfe( FBI Agent Winters ) . Samantha Alvarado( Officer Jess Molina ) . Tyree Marshall( Nicole Davis ) . Nick A. Fisher( Toby Wakefield ) . Jeremy Shouldis( Robert Rendon ) . Stefan Marks( FBI Agent Laughton ) . Nicola Bertram( Dr. Lydia Stein ) . Avi Bernard( Mechanic ) . Jono Cota( Dying Man ) . Jon Curry( Det. Franks ) . JR Reed( Det. Musso ) . Eamonn Welliver( Young Harry Bosch ) . Grace Shen( Flora Poompan ) . Todd Aaron Brotze( Guy Claudy ) . Aisha Lomax( Creighton Assistant ) . George Lee Jones( FBI Agent Charles ) . Samantha Cutaran( Linda Howard ) . Tristen MacDonald( Danielle Golliher ) . Michael Broderick( Gary McIntyre ) . Cindy Chu( Deputy City Attorney Diane Gao ) . Clint Jordan( Father ) . Mona Patel( Diya Basu ) . Eli Fucile( High School Kid ) . Alexis Rhee( Haru Cheong ) . Emil Beheshti( City Inspector ) . Kurt Kanazawa( Sneezy )

Language English.

Producers Tom Bernardo. Pieter Jan Brugge. Michael Connelly. Eric Ellis Overmyer. Titus Welliver. Henrik Bastin. Jamie D. Boscardin. Barbara Curry. Zetna Fuentes. Naomi Iizuka. Theresa Snider. Trey Batchelor. Mark Douglas. Osokwe Tychicus Vasquez.

Production Amazon Studios. Fabel Entertainment.

Creator Tom Bernardo. Michael Connelly(based on the novels). Eric Ellis Overmyer.

Number of Seasons 2

Number of Episodes 20

Status OnGoing (2022–)
